title: This spacious 1 bed, 1 bath unit is sure to delight as it combines mod
description: This spacious 1 bed, 1 bath unit is sure to delight as it combines modern finishes with the appeal of classic luxury and city living. The unit is a diamond in the rough, professionally remodeled using current materials and finishes like Viatera Everest Quartz countertops, Carrera marble mosaics, and custom blended expresso stain on the beautiful solid cherry floors. Upon entering the unit, you are immediately in awe of the 10 ft high ceilings, oversized windows and recessed lighting that pour light throughout the main living space, giving this unit an incredibly open and airy layout. Gone are the dated burgundy countertops and orange colored floors, and yellowed kitchen cabinets.! The newly remodeled kitchen is a rarity in the building - crown molding paired with quartz countertops, Cararra marble mosaic backsplash, stainless steel Fisher Paykel, Kitchen Aid and Electrolux appliances, newly refinished cabinets and breakfast bar give the open layout kitchen a sizable footprint to maneuver around and cook with ease. The breakfast bar seating abuts a spacious living space with large windows that capture tons of natural light into the unit. One of the largest in the building, the generously sized bedroom will easily accommodate a king size bed as well as lounge seating and dresser space. A large closet also helps keep your wardrobe organized and stowed out of sight to maximize bedroom space. The oversized bath is also updated and done in lovely Carrera marble featuring a solid wood vanity, solid Carrera countertop, a 5 foot wide mirrored medicine cabinet and cheerful lighting. An added convenience includes a stackable washer/dryer in unit! Condo fees cover central air and heating, water and sewer, trash, secure entrance with 24-hour concierge, on-site fitness center and access to a residents lounge. The posh lobby and common spaces are just one of several building amenities that increase the grand appeal of living at The Ellington.

title: At last--the first boutique condo conversion in the Penn Alexander cat
description: At last--the first boutique condo conversion in the Penn Alexander catchment area. These large homes provide the gracious scale and original details that are the hallmark of the neighborhood's Victorian houses, while offering all the right updates, including all-new kitchens, bathrooms, HVAC and the ease of maintenance associated with condo living. No aluminum-and-stucco boxes here; the developer took care to preserve the lovely character of the elegant Victorian twin building, both inside and out. And it could not be in a more idyllic location: half a block from Clark Park and within blocks of all the neighborhood hot spots. The perfect alternative to renting, and without the hefty monthly fees that come with larger condo buildings, Unit 2 is a super-spacious one-bedroom that fills the entire floor and boasts 12 windows. With plenty of space for a dedicated dining area, the large, wide-open living area has a pretty bay window, new hardwood flooring and recessed lighting and leads into the spacious kitchen featuring a Frigidaire stainless steel appliance package, Shaker-style maple cabinetry, wood-grain ceramic tile flooring, granite countertops and an extra-deep stainless steel undermount sink. The humungous bedroom also has new hardwood flooring, closets galore, a large separate area for a home office, dressing area or yoga space, and a stylish en suite bathroom with large vanity, subway tile shower surround with inlaid mosaic tile stone border and conveniently located stackable washer/dryer.

title: Need two roommates for a 3 bed 3.5 bath
description:
My two roommates are moving out, and I'm trying to stay on for another lease at this same house. Pretty great spot, right across the street from the Whole Foods, just a few blocks from all the bars and stuff around Headhouse Square. The house has basement storage with a spare bathroom and a roofdeck, central air and heating. The roommates are leaving at different times, one shooting for mid May and the other shooting for mid June, so there is some flexibility with move in dates. I'm hoping to have the lease signed by the end of April.
About me: bartender and writer, I generally spend most of my time in my room or at work and only have more than one person over maybe once a month, if that. But I do keep a well stocked home bar and kitchen so I'm onboard for reasonably sized gatherings. I have two cats, both very friendly and sociable and mostly just follow me around but if they like you they might hang out with you while I'm not around. They get into mild scuffles sometimes but I'm fairly certain they'd be fine with another cat, which the landlord would need to approve.

title: Poth Brewery Lofts – Studios Available
description:
Poth Brewery Lofts has been revived into an authentic loft and public space, now serving as the focal point of the Brewerytown neighborhood. The building has a relaxed and cozy atmosphere with soft, warm wall tones, unique architectural details, and exposed concrete ceiling features. Additionally, Poth Brewery Lofts is pet-friendly with no breed restrictions, making it a welcoming home for furry friends.
Each unit is designed with an open concept, allowing ample natural light to enter through the large windows. The countertops are made with Calcutta Roma, and the stainless steel appliances provide residents with a modern and sleek living space. Furthermore, tenants can opt for exposed concrete flooring and a tiled bathroom with a walk-in shower. The units also include an in-unit washer/dryer, among other amenities.
At Poth Brewery Lofts, residents can use several amenities, such as a vast open lobby area with a 24-hour front desk concierge, a fully equipped gym, and a roof deck with stunning city views. title: Unbeatable location right between everything Rittenhouse and Graduate
description: Unbeatable location right between everything Rittenhouse and Graduate Hospital have to offer, this spacious, cheerful, and charming 1 BR/1.5 ba condo offers a quiet respite from the city, with unique features including a huge private basement that doubles your space for storage, office, workshop, gym, or whatever you'd like to create. The master bedroom has double closets with storage above, and a private en suite bath with tub and shower. Off the bedroom, you'll find a small and lovely private patio for your morning coffee or drinks to unwind after a long day. The private basement is nearly as large as the unit itself, and includes front loading washer/dryer & Bilco door to the street to bring in any large items or bicycles, etc.

description:
119 Titan Street
Philadelphia, PA 19147
*Pet Friendly
Large 3-story, 3 bedroom townhouse/row on a quiet street in the vibrant Pennsport neighborhood of Philadelphia. This spacious home is located close to restaurants, shopping, movies, schools/churches and transportation, with easy access to Center City, major highways (I-95, I-76, Delaware Avenue, etc.) and bridges (Ben Franklin and Walt Whitman).
1st Floor consists of an open floor plan with spacious living room, large dining room, and separate kitchen. Living room and dining room contain oak hardwood flooring, crown moldings and chair rail throughout. The large bright kitchen includes maple cabinets, counter, sink, appliances (including gas range, dishwasher, garbage disposal, and built-in microwave), tile floor, crown molding and chair rail. The sunny kitchen leads out to a private, enclosed back yard/patio with 6 foot wall surrounding it.
2nd Floor consists of large Master bedroom with 2 closets and original wood floors. The large renovated bathroom with full tub is located just off of the Master bedroom. In addition, there is a “Bonus Room” on this floor that could be used as an office or large walk-in closet.
3rd Floor consists of 2 bedrooms each with ample closet space and original wood floors
Finally, there is a large basement (unfinished) that includes washer/dryer plus tons of additional storage space.
SUMMARY:
• 3 bedrooms + bonus room (office or large walk-in closet)
• Large renovated bathroom with full-size tub
• Spacious living room and dining room with oak hardwood flooring, crown moldings, and chair rail throughout
• Bright, sunny, renovated kitchen with gas range, dishwasher, and built-in microwave
• Large, private, enclosed brick patio/backyard

title: This Stunning Corner and Rare Condo That is a Fully Renovated Find
description:
This stunning corner and rare condo that is a fully renovated find, with many luxurious upgrades such as quartz countertops and luxury flooring throughout is in the heart of Washington Square. Everything in this unit is brand new, from the designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances to the upgraded bathroom, interior lighting, custom window treatments, and professionally painted interiors. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath unit provides spacious living in the heart of vibrant Washington Sq West, with nearby theaters, fine dining, coffee shops, top medical centers, idyllic parks, and myriad shopping options that offer a high quality, convenient standard of living. With no other tenants on the floor, this special unit is very private. Upon entering, the main living space is airy and open, with lots of natural light from a wall of windows at the front and side, and window treatments that can be raised or lowered for added privacy. The entire condo features modern, engineered hardwood floors. The tasteful kitchen offers upgraded gray cabinetry, white quartz waterfall counters, stainless steel appliances, Calacatta tile backsplash, deep double sinks, under cabinet hidden outlets, a large appliance cubby, pantry, an extended peninsula with pendant lighting, and comfortable seating for two or more. The primary master suite features a large bedroom, a walk-in closet, and a luxurious full bathroom with designer tile, a glass-enclosed shower, and dual access pocket doors. The second bedroom also has a walk-in closet. The entry hall includes multiple closets for coats, a washer/ dryer hook-up space, an electric water heater, and the central HVAC. FURNISHED options available. ** Prices subject to change on daily basis *
301 S 11th St #101

title: Discover this charming property in Philadelphia!!
description:
Center City West is a neighborhood within Center City, the downtown district of Philadelphia. This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods. The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Nearby Rittenhouse Square is a popular spot for festivals and farmers markets while the Schuylkill Banks has excellent riverside running and biking trails with a view.
105 S 18th Street S #5C

title: Discover this charming property in Philadelphia!!
description:
Center City West is a neighborhood within Center City, the downtown district of Philadelphia. This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods. The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Nearby Rittenhouse Square is a popular spot for festivals and farmers markets while the Schuylkill Banks has excellent riverside running and biking trails with a view.

description:
Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home! This stunning newly constructed building is situated in the heart of Philadelphia and offers six units of modern luxury living. Unit #301 is a beautiful 2 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom apartment, boasting ample natural light and a private roof deck for your relaxation and enjoyment. Each unit in the building comes equipped with top-notch security features, including front door security cameras, alarm systems, and smart home intercom systems. You'll also enjoy a range of high-tech amenities, such as Nest thermostats, remote-controlled range hoods, rain shower heads, and garbage disposals. Inside your apartment, you'll be greeted by desirable features such as white oak hardwood floors, recessed lighting, central air conditioning, and in-unit laundry facilities. The kitchen is a chef's dream, with navy and white cabinetry, stunning quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas range, and double-door refrigerator. The bedrooms are spacious and come with ample closet space, while the bathrooms boast unique tiling, floating wood vanities, and glass shower doors. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to live in the lap of luxury in Philadelphia. Schedule your tour today before it's too late!

title: Amazing Apt in the desirable Olde Kensington neighborhood!
description:
Welcome to 1213 N Howard Street in the desirable Olde Kensington neighborhood of Philadelphia! This beautiful three-story trinity offers the perfect blend of modern amenities and charming character. The home boasts three bedrooms and one bathroom, perfect for a small family or roommates. The kitchen is equipped with a stainless steel appliance package, providing all the necessary tools for your culinary creations. The home also offers a nice-sized yard, providing ample space to relax outdoors. This home's location is truly ideal, as it is within walking distance of all the shops and restaurants in the trendy Northern Liberties and Fishtown neighborhoods. title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.

title: What a great time to be shopping for a home!
description:
What a great time to be shopping for a home! How hard is it to find a decent ranch home these days? Well you're in luck -- this well-cared for 3 bedroom, 2 full-2 half bath ranch home, on a quiet, sought-after street in Oak Lane is now available! Only two other families have lived in this home, including the builder. The current owner has lovingly maintained and upgraded the home throughout the years and is ready to turn it over to someone else who will love and care for it just as much! Walk past the landscaped front garden (the daffodils , tulips and perennials will be springing up shortly!) to the easy-access front entry way with a conveniently located powder room right off of the spacious, light-filled living room and dining area. Notice the custom curtains and blinds, and the bow window?! The updated eat-in kitchen offers an electric cooktop range, Corian countertops, beautiful backsplash, gas wall oven, stainless dishwasher and garbage disposal and exit to the side yard. Down the hall you'll the large main bedroom with an updated en suite bathroom with stall shower, the spacious 2nd bedroom which overlooks the rear yard and side yards, and the 3rd bedroom, which would be great as a bedroom, nursery or home office.
Give me your phone number please.
